price: 92. Dia (Yusuf) berkata, “Pada hari ini tidak ada cercaan terhadap kamu, mudah-mudahan Allah mengampuni kamu. Dan Dia Maha Penyayang di antara para penyayang.
arabic: قَالَ لَا تَثۡرِيبَ عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ يَغۡفِرُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ أَرۡحَمُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla lā tathrība ʿalaykumu al-yawma yaghfiru al-lahu lakum wahuwa arḥamu al-rāḥimīna
